comment._content: why do they wear so much clothes

comment.author: 69709626@N00
comment._content: @grassplanter - they may have put their jacket and hats back on to eat as being in a state of undress may have offended others. Either that or, being an English Summer, it wasn't that warm that day.

comment.author: 22081583@N06
comment._content: All three horses are wearing ear covers, these protect the sensitive skin inside the ears from the bites of flies.
